name: codespace-agent
description: Secure codespace agent with file operations and terminal access

scripts.start: CODESPACE_NAME=$(gh codespace view --json name -q '.name') && gh codespace ports visibility 3001:public -c "$CODESPACE_NAME" && node agent.js
scripts.dev: CODESPACE_NAME=$(gh codespace view --json name -q '.name') && gh codespace ports visibility 3001:public -c "$CODESPACE_NAME" && nodemon agent.js
